I stand by what I've said about those events, but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on. Eric Schmidt said that managing Google has become a more complex job as the company has diversified. Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, he said.
